skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guardian
des:
Home alone and curious if you remembered to lock the doors? Starting to feel a bit chilly in the middle of reading a book or working in the home office? Need to turn on a light without stumbling around in the dark? Just ask Alexa to do it for you! The Guardian Protection Services skill allows you to control and monitor many of your security and smart home features conveniently. 
Here are a few examples of other commands (start with “Alexa, ask Guardian…”): 

Scenes
"...Sleep."
"...run Sleep scene."

Security
"...is my security system (dis)armed?" 
"...to arm stay my security system."
"...to disarm."

Access
“…if the garage door is open?” 
“…close the garage door.”
“…is the front door unlocked?”
“…lock the front door.” 

Thermostat
“…what is the temperature?” 
“…set the living room to AC mode.”
“…set the kitchen thermostat to 72 degrees.”

Lights
“…turn the kitchen light on.”
“…set the living room light to 20 percent.”
“…turn off the lights.”

Video Monitoring
“…record a clip with the living room camera.”
“…pan the living room camera to the couch.”

Is the skill having trouble picking up some of your devices? Try changing the name of your equipment to something more common or check your equipment name for spelling errors.
Before using this skill, you will need your Guardian Protection Services username and password to link your Guardian Protection Services with Alexa. Please note that the Guardian Protection Services skill only works for customers who have integrated systems powered by Alarm.com.
